0.0.3.name: wordpress/faces-of-users
0.0.3.description:
Faces of Users gives you a shortcode to display all of your registered users Gravatars. Current options include; sizing, displaying user names and default Gravatar.

  1. Install plugin
  2. Add [facesofusers] shortcode to your content
  3. Done!

Some examples and feature requests for Faces of Users on BinaryM.com
